document_data.mainbody:
Brohn was a member of the Targos Guard, active in the early 14 century DR.
In the , the town of Targos in Icewind Dale became besieged by the Legion of the Chimera. One of the Legions surprise attacks herded a troop of goblins by magical means through underground tunnels into the Targos docks, where Brohn and his partners, Reig Redwaters and Honest Jon, stood guard. Reig and Jon managed to survive, but Brohn was killed by a goblin arrow that pierced the mans throat.
